name: cal-com
description: Cal.com is an open-source scheduling platform designed to provide Calendly-like capabilities. It integrates with other apps, supports self-hosting, and includes role-based access, API triggers, and booking widgets.
features: Scheduling Platform: Open-source Calendly alternative for booking meetings. Professional scheduling.
Calendar Integration: Sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, and more. Unified availability.
Booking Widgets: Embeddable booking forms for your website. Seamless integration.
Role-Based Access: Team scheduling with permission controls. Collaborative booking.
API Triggers: Automate workflows with webhooks and API. Powerful automation.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your scheduling data. Data privacy.
App Integrations: Connect with Zoom, Teams, and other tools. Complete ecosystem.
